deltas.text: CES 'AI Pin' hype cycle collapsing rapidly
OpenAI 'Opera' architecture hints at recursive agents

update.matters: The gap between 'Demo AI' and 'Production AI' is widening. Capital is fleeing vaporware for sovereign infrastructure.
update.confidence: High confidence that 2026 is the year of 'Local Weights'. The cloud rent-seeking model is under siege.
update.unresolved: Will the 'Great Bifurcation' of the internet accelerate due to divergent AI safety standards?

beliefs.statement: Intelligence must be sovereign to be trusted for high-stakes decisions.
beliefs.evidence_for: DeepSeek R1 success; Apple's on-device pivot.
beliefs.evidence_against: Cloud scaling laws still dominant for training (not inference).

beliefs.statement: Synthetic data loops will poison closed-source models first.
beliefs.evidence_against: New techniques in model merging (Model Soup) showing resilience.

beliefs.statement: The 'Agentic Web' will replace the 'Search Web' by Q4 2026.
beliefs.evidence_against: Latency and hallucinations in multi-step reasoning still prohibitive.

risks.compounding_factor: If verify/auth tech lags behind voice synthesis, trust networks will collapse into 'Web of Trust' silos.
If successful, open-weights become illegal, forcing intelligence into a black market.

council.architect: The signal is unambiguous. Build local. Trust code, not APIs.
council.skeptic: We are underestimating the compute density required for true reasoning.

council.conclusion: Accelerate local stack deployment. Reduce dependency on API providers.
